objects.title: Self-Portrait
Temptation of St. Anthony
objects.provenance:
Gustav von Gerhardt, Budapest, Hungary, until 1911.{1} Mrs. Moric Palugyay and Mrs. Moric Tomcsanyi. Budapest, by 1927.{2} (Ivan N. Podgoursky, New York, New York); George Henry Alexander Clowes, Indianapolis, Indiana, in 1944; The Clowes Fund, Indianapolis, from 1958–2020, and on long-term loan to the Indianapolis Museum of Art, since 1971; given to the Indianapolis Museum of Art at Newfields, in 2020.

{1} Sammlung des. Königl[ichen]. Ungar[ischen]. Hofrats Gustav von Gerhardt, Budapest : Zweiter Teil : Gemälde Alter Meister, sale catalogue, Rudolph Lepke’s Kunst-Auctions-Haus, Berlin, 10 November 1911, no. 61, plate 30.
{2} Catalogue de l’Exposition Belge d’art Ancien et Moderne, Budapest: Imp. de la Société Anonyme Athenaeum, 1927, 34, no. 191.
